## Extreme PPC Failures

```{r ppc-extreme-failures}
if ("ppc" %in% names(analysis_results) && nrow(analysis_results$ppc$extreme_failures) > 0) {
  # Summarize extreme failures
  failure_summary <- analysis_results$ppc$extreme_failures %>%
    count(model, model_type, failure_severity, name = "n_failures") %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = failure_severity, values_from = n_failures, values_fill = 0) %>%
    arrange(desc(severe), desc(moderate), desc(mild))
  
  DT::datatable(failure_summary, 
                caption = "Extreme PPC Failures by Model and Severity",
                options = list(pageLength = 15, scrollX = TRUE))
  
  # Most problematic statistics
  cat("\n\n### Most Problematic Statistics\n\n")
  
  problem_stats <- analysis_results$ppc$extreme_failures %>%
    count(statistic, failure_severity) %>%
    pivot_wider(names_from = failure_severity, values_from = n, values_fill = 0) %>%
    mutate(total_failures = severe + moderate + mild) %>%
    arrange(desc(total_failures)) %>%
    head(10)
  
  kable(problem_stats, caption = "Statistics with Most Extreme PPP Failures") %>%
    kableExtra::kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"))
  
} else {
  cat("No extreme PPC failures detected across all models.")
}
```

## PPC Insights Summary

```{r ppc-insights}
if ("ppc" %in% names(analysis_results)) {
  cat("### Key PPC Findings\n\n")
  
  # Best performing models
  if (nrow(analysis_results$ppc$model_summary) > 0) {
    best_ppc_model <- analysis_results$ppc$model_summary$model[1]
    best_ppc_score <- analysis_results$ppc$model_summary$overall_proportion_extreme[1]
    
    cat("- **Best overall PPC performance:** ", best_ppc_model, " (", round(best_ppc_score * 100, 1), "% extreme PPP)\n")
  }
  
  # Most challenging domains
  if (nrow(analysis_results$ppc$domain_summary) > 0) {
    difficult_domains <- analysis_results$ppc$domain_summary %>%
      arrange(desc(proportion_extreme)) %>%
      head(3) %>%
      pull(domain)
    
    cat("- **Most challenging behavioral domains:** ", paste(difficult_domains, collapse = ", "), "\n")
  }
  
  # Overall failure rate
  if (nrow(analysis_results$ppc$extreme_failures) > 0) {
    total_statistics <- sum(analysis_results$ppc$model_summary$total_statistics, na.rm = TRUE)
    total_failures <- nrow(analysis_results$ppc$extreme_failures)
    failure_rate <- round((total_failures / total_statistics) * 100, 1)
    
    cat("- **Overall extreme failure rate:** ", failure_rate, "% of all statistics\n")
  }
  
  cat("\n")
}
```
